commit.message:
Merge #9532

9532: Shorten thread names r=lnicola a=weirdsmiley

Threads on Linux have an upper limit of 16 characters, hence dropping `Thread` from their names.

Co-authored-by: Manas <manas18244@iiitd.ac.in>
